original_text: When the angel who spoke to him had departed, he called two of his servants and a devout soldier from among those who attended him,
korean_text: 마침 말하던 천사가 떠나매 고넬료가 집안 하인 둘과 부하 가운데 경건한 사람 하나를 불러

sentences.original_text: When the angel who spoke to him had departed,
he called two of his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 종 두 사람을 불렀고

sentences.original_text: from among those who attended him,
